snippet: Vice Adm. Michael Connor is succeeding Vice Adm. John Richardson as the Navy’s top submarine commander and will directly manage the force’s Atlantic fleet.
abstract: Navy puts Vice Adm Michael Connor in charge of its submarine force; Connor is succeeding Vice Adm John Richardson, who is taking over as director of naval nuclear propulsion.
lead_paragraph: Vice Adm. Michael Connor is succeeding Vice Adm. John Richardson as the Navy’s top submarine commander and will directly manage the force’s Atlantic fleet.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
